name: Sourcify
headline: Sourcify helps brands manufacture products in Asia.
description: Sourcify is a profitable high growth sourcing platform that helps ecommerce brands and Fortune 500s manufacture products in Asia.

#  We Guarantee 10%+ Product Margin Savings 
3,000+ Vetted Factories with Full Transparency and Your Own Localized Supply Chain Team 
[Submit a RFQ for Free ![](https://www.sourcify.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Vector.png)](https://www.sourcify.com/<https:/www.sourcify.com/schedule/>)
Trusted by

##  We love increasing your product margins.
We saved 30-40% net across all products working with Sourcify. I was blown away by the cost savings and quality improvements. 
###### Jason Vessey
Co-Founder of Arcturus Gear
###  Work with the best factories across over a hundred product categories. 
Whether you're selling on Shopify or through a big box retailer, our factory network has been developed to increase your margin. 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%200%200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##### Fashion Accessories
Bracelets, Necklaces, and more
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%200%200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##### Fashion and Athleisure
Shirts, sportswear, and more
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%200%200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##### Homegoods
Furniture, candles, and more
# How it works
Our mission is to help ecommerce driven brands to increase their margin while improving transparency in their supply chain. 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%200%200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Describe your project
We help you source the best factories to meet your needs.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%200%200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Meet your ideal factory partners.
We can match you and get factory quotes in a few days. 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%200%200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Software brings more visibility.
Our custom software makes tracking production easy.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%200%200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Accountability on both sides
Our localized team is there to support you through the sourcing process. 
[Schedule a free consultation ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%200%200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://www.sourcify.com/<https:/www.sourcify.com/schedule/>)
## Proven Efficiency
Guaranteed Factories, Full Transparency, Zero Headache
# 107,933
Products sourced

# 3,000+

[Schedule a free consultation ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%200%200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://www.sourcify.com/<https:/www.sourcify.com/schedule/>)
# Not spending more than $1m a year on production?
Product Sourcing School will teach you the ins and outs of scaling your supply chain!
There’s a product inside you. And my goal is to help you find it and turn it into a bestseller to accomplish your unique product motives–even if you’re busy, idea-less, or bad at design like me.
In the last 10 years, I’ve brought hundreds of products to market, all while helping thousands of people in dozens of industries source their own product, and growing Sourcify to become the leading product sourcing school working with startups and Fortune 100s like Anheuser Busch.
What’s the “secret”? A proven system to beat overwhelm, harness the right sourcing methods for quality, and guide you from idea to bestseller. Join me on a free training workshop by clicking the blue button below.
– Nathan, Founder & CEO
Next Webinar: 
[Learn More](https://www.sourcify.com/<https:/www.sourcify.com/programs/>)
[Spending More Than $500k on Production?](https://www.sourcify.com/<https:/www.sourcify.com/enterprisesourcing/>)
As Featured On:
## What Is Product Sourcing School?
Featured across CNBC, CNN, and Enterpreneur, Product Sourcing School is an online education company that teaches people how to source, manufacture, & sell their first product in as little as 90 days as well as aiding those founders in accomplishing their unique goals tied to their products, whether that’s becoming a full-time creator, growing your business, sharing your product with the world, and more.
[Learn more about PSS](https://www.sourcify.com/</about-us/>)
###  With thousands of success stories, Product Sourcing School is the #1 system for manufacturing a best selling product to accomplish your unique business goals

## Watch some CNBC interviews with our Founder, Nathan Resnick:
From quality issues to a proven system for everyone wanting to manufacture their own product, I’m sharing my life mission and passion with all of you.
Think you don’t have time to produce your own product? That you’re too busy to make this dream, this goal of yours a reality? I’ve broken down how to manufacture a product and what it really takes—and you all have what it takes.
Ready to take the plunge?
Join me on a free training workshop by clicking the blue button below.
[Learn More](https://www.sourcify.com/<https:/www.sourcify.com/programs/>)
[Spending More Than $500k on Production?](https://www.sourcify.com/<https:/www.sourcify.com/enterprisesourcing/>)
## Why Work With Us
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%200%200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
With offices across Asia and manufacturing partners in almost any category, Sourcify is the go-to resource For ensuring a stable and scalable supply chain. 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%200%200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
We never load containers without third party quality control and take care all of sourcing, production management, freight and importation (if you'd like). 
[Schedule a free consultation ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%200%200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://www.sourcify.com/<https:/www.sourcify.com/schedule/>)

Because we all start somewhere :)

Everything you need to start working with a factory

## Learn From Our Free Podcast, Ecommerce on Tap
Ecommerce on Tap is the go to podcast diving into the ins and take out manufacturing products. In this podcast, Nathan interviews everyone from first time founders to director of supply chains at Fortune 100s.
If you’re looking to learn more about product sourcing take out, give this podcast a listen. Available on Itunes, Spotify, Soundcloud, and more!
[Listen Now](https://www.sourcify.com/<https:/www.sourcify.com/ecommerce-on-tap/>)
## Subscribe to FREE Ecommerce Insights.
Every Tuesday we send a deep dive on a ecommerce growth tip, brand story, or current trend. Join tens of thousands of readers every week: 
### Product Sourcing School has worked with over 1,273 students in 27+ countries around the world.
No matter where you live or work, you have a product to manufacture. We’re here to help you accomplish that goal.

# Not spending more than $1m a year on production?
Product Sourcing School will teach you the ins and outs of scaling your supply chain!
There’s a product inside you. And my goal is to help you find it and turn it into a bestseller to accomplish your unique product motives–even if you’re busy, idea-less, or bad at design like me.
In the last 10 years, I’ve brought hundreds of products to market, all while helping thousands of people in dozens of industries source their own product, and growing Sourcify to become the leading product sourcing school working with startups and Fortune 100s like Anheuser Busch.
What’s the “secret”? A proven system to beat overwhelm, harness the right sourcing methods for quality, and guide you from idea to bestseller. Join me on a free training workshop by clicking the blue button below.
– Nathan, Founder & CEO

generated_description:
**Sourcify: Simplifying Manufacturing for E-commerce Brands**

Founded in 2017 as part of Y Combinator's Batch W18, Sourcify is a San Diego-based company on a mission to facilitate product manufacturing in Asia. Their model is straightforward: they help e-commerce brands and even Fortune 500 companies manufacture products efficiently, all while ensuring substantial cost savings and transparency in the supply chain. 

**What They Offer**

Sourcify is essentially a high-growth sourcing platform where brands can access a network of over 3,000 vetted factories across various product categories—be it fashion, home goods, or accessories. Their expertise translates into significant savings of 10% or more on product margins, as they act as a middleman equipped to share insights and knowledge accrued from years of experience in the manufacturing landscape.

Services include:

- **Sourcing Services:** Tailored solutions for both small influencers and large enterprises.
- **Production Guides:** Detailed guides for different manufacturing hubs including India, Vietnam, and Mexico.
- **Factory Network:** Tools to find manufacturers based on specific needs.
- **Educational Resources:** Their Product Sourcing School provides valuable training, empowering individuals to source and manufacture their own products effectively.

**Why Sourcify Stands Out**

With a dedicated team of 15, Sourcify fosters a community centered on education and support. Their approach involves not just connecting brands with factories, but also providing continuous consultation through a localized support team, ensuring that clients navigate each step of the sourcing process without the typical headaches. 

**Results Driven**

The numbers back it up: Sourcify has sourced almost 108,000 products and boasts an average response time of just 72 hours for production quotes. They've successfully worked with a variety of well-known brands, all while ensuring quality control before products leave the factories.

For anyone with manufacturing needs—especially those planning to spend $100k or more annually—Sourcify is worth considering. They’re not just doers; they’re educators and innovators, providing the tools needed for anyone looking to make their mark in the e-commerce space.

To explore Sourcify's offerings or to get started, check out [Sourcify’s website](https://www.sourcify.com/) or connect directly at 619-473-2149.
